mapper.select: SELECT car.id as id, car.position as position, type.content as type, car.size as size, car.`status` as status, car.update_date as updateDate FROM car,type where car.status='空车位' and car.type_id=type.id

select car.id as id, car.position as position, user.`name` as name, type.content as type, car.size as size, car.`status` as status, car.update_date as updateDate FROM user,car,type where (user.id=car.user_id AND car.type_id=type.id)

select car.id as id, car.position as position, user.`name` as name, type.content as type, car.size as size, car.`status` as status, car.update_date as updateDate FROM user,car,type where (user.id=car.user_id AND car.type_id=type.id) and (type.content LIKE concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or user.name like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or car.position like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%'))

select car.id as id, car.position as position, type.content as type, car.size as size, car.`status` as status, car.update_date as updateDate FROM car,type where ( car.type_id=type.id) and car.status='空车位' and (type.content LIKE concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or car.position like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%'))
mapper.update: update car SET status=#{status} where user_id=#{userId}
